def solu1_example(s1,s2):
   alist = list(s2)
   pos1 = 0
   stillok = True
   while pos1 < len(s1) and stillok: #åªè¦å­—ç¬¦ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°å°±å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡32è¡Œé€€å‡º
       pos2 = 0
       found =False
       while pos2 < len(alist) and not found:     
           if s1[pos2] ==  alist[pos2]:
               found = True
           else:
               pos2 = pos2 + 1
           if found:
               alist[pos2] = None
           else:
               stillok = False
       pos1 = pos1 + 1
   return stillok

def solu2(s1,s2):

def solu4(s1,s2):
    c1 = [0] * 26
    c2 = [0] * 26
    for i in range(len(s1)):
        pos = ord(s1[i]) - ord('a')   #è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦çš„uincodeç¼–ç 
        c1[pos] = c1[pos] + 1
    for i in range(len(s2)):
        pos = ord(s2[i]) - ord('a')
        c2[pos] = c2[pos] + 1
    j = 0
    stillok = True
    while j < 26 and stillok:
        if c1[j] == c2[j]:
            j = j + 1
        else:
            stillok = False
        return stillok
